parameter.name: config_202_1
parameter.label: 202: Humidity Sensor Calibration
parameter.description:
The range of calibration value is -50 to 50 (percent).
The calibration value = standard value - measure value.
Example: if measured value = 80RH and the standard value = 75RH, then calibration
value = 75 – 80 = -5 (0xFB). !

parameter.name: config_203_2
parameter.label: 203: Luminance Sensor Calibration
parameter.description:
The range of calibration value is -1000 to 1000 (lux).
The calibration value = standard value - measure value.
Example: if measured value = 800 Lux and the standard value = 750 Lux, then
calibration value= 750 – 800 = -50 (0xFFCE). !

parameter.name: config_204_1
parameter.label: 204: Ultraviolet Sensor Calibration
parameter.description:
The range of calibration value is -10 to 10 (UV index scale).
The calibration value = standard value - measure value.
Example: if measured value = 9 and the standard value = 8, then
calibration value = 8 – 9 = -1 (0xFE). !
